sentences.sContent: Heritage falls apart on the harbor's shore, iron rusts and there is no foreshore access.
sentences.sContent_eng: Heritage falls apart on the harbor's shore, iron rusts and there is no foreshore access.
sentences.sCn: 港口海岸上的遗迹已经分崩离析，钢铁生锈； 没有可以进入的海滩。

sentences.sContent: Heritage falls apart on the harbor's shore, iron rusts and there is no foreshore access. Two huge cement factories that dominate the view around the bay pollute the water.
sentences.sContent_eng: Heritage falls apart on the harbor's shore, iron rusts and there is no foreshore access. Two huge cement factories that dominate the view around the bay pollute the water.
sentences.sCn: 港口岸边到处是破碎的遗迹，所有的铁都生锈了，也不可能到海滩上去——岸边的两座水泥工厂污染了整个水域。

trans.tranOther: the part of the shore between the highest and lowest levels that the sea reaches
